description: This table contains order specific questions and their responses.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line item for this record determined by the order specific question ID

columns.name: ORD_QUEST_ID
columns.description: The identification number of the question for this order.

columns.name: ORD_QUEST_DATE
columns.description: The date of the question for this order.

columns.name: IS_ANSWR_BYPROC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this question was answered by the procedure. 'Y' indicates that the question was answered. 'N' indicates that the question was not answered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ORD_QUEST_COMP
columns.description: The line number of the medication in the mixture that triggers this specific question for an IV or total parenteral nutrition (TPN) order.

columns.name: ORD_QUEST_RESP
columns.description: The response to the question for this order.

columns.name: ORD_QUEST_CMT
columns.description: The comments on the question of the order.
